column3: Feel free to pull in any of these fixups as well: https://github.com/jonatack/bitcoin/commit/e279f6a09a38dabc6b80d537d3212abddba5ed8b
In future, please remove the default comment from the PR template, even if you're not writing a PR description. Also, you can use a prefix in your commit message. See how I've edited the title.
